name: Space Bugs (RadRize, Moth, JBrickman, NorenK, CH51)
name_original: Space Bugs (RadRize, Moth, JBrickman, NorenK, CH51)
description:
Enbark into a unique space adventure. You are the last hope of the human species, you must save your allies trapped in the motherships. Find information inside the enemie ships in order to unlock pieces of the map and know the mothership's location. Figh fiercely the evil alien species! 

Explore the ships, generated procedually, everyone will be different, dont die and dont get lost!
